greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Signature permutation of a Catalan bijection: The inverse of A154451.
comment: This automorphism of rooted plane binary trees switches the two descendant trees for every other vertex as it descends along the 111... ray, starting swapping already at the root. Specifically, *A154452 = psi(A154442), where the isomorphism psi is given in A153141 (see further comments there).
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2055
Index entries for signature-permutations of Catalan automorphisms
program: (Scheme function, destructive implementation of this automorphism acting on S-expressions:) (define (*A154452! s) (cond ((pair? s) (*A069770! s) (*A154450! (cdr s)))) s)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 17 2009
